page.title: 12PARISH COUNCIL
page.content:
THERE ARE 7 COUNCELLORS WHO MEET AT INTERVALS TO DISCUSS PROBLEMS IN THE PARISH AND TO KEEP AN EYE ON PLANNING AND THE TIDINESS OF THE AREA. AT THE MOMENT THEY ARE WORKING TO RE-ESTABLISH THE FOOTPATHS AND BRIDLEPATHS WHICH HAVE ALMOST DISAPPEARED THROUGH LACK OF USE.
THEY ARE ALSO FIGHTING TO GET A SPEED LIMIT ALONG THE A47 TRUNK ROAD AND PASS ON COMPLAINTS OF ROAD CONDITIONS ETC.
A YOUTHCLUB IS VERY BADLY NEEDED NOW THAT THERE ARE MORE CHILDREN IN THE VILLAGE AND A VOLUNTEER IS REQUIRED.
